hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NODE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the vapp that will contain the running vm. The same name will be registered as the node name with the chef server.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Run the following knife command # knife.rb specifies ubuntu as user cd /home/ubuntu/vcadevops/chef-repo
knife vcair server create -VV --ssh-password Password1 --image "Ubuntu Server 12.04 LTS (amd64 20150127)" \ --customization-script ./add_public_ssh_key.sh --cpus 2 --memory 4096 \ --node-name $NODE_NAME --vcair-net "M933009684-4424-default-routed" --no-host-key-verify
# See that the node is now a registered client of the Chef Server knife client list
# Get the IP for the new VM export NIP=`knife node show $NODE_NAME | grep IP: | cut -d: -f2 | sed -e 's/^[[:space:]]*//'`
# echo "New Server created at ${NIP}"
exit
